Game.Name: Tennis no Ouji-sama 2003 - Passion Red (Japan)
Game.plot: Tennis no Oji-Sama 2003 is a Sports game, published by Konami,which was released in Japan in 2003.Cheat: R.K.O (Defualt Win in a Match)To get a R.K.O (a default win) get the opponent to lose/break his racket 3 times and after the third time you'll win the match no matter the circumstances.
